skills.name: MIGHTY ROAR
desc: • Deals 2 hits of physical damage to a single target.
• Increase DEF of allies for 2 turns.
• Remove Negative Effects, including Silver Effects, from all allies on Perfect Hits.

skills.name: SURVIVE
desc: • Grant Immortality to an ally for 2 turns.
• Grants an Extra Turn to the target ally.

skills.name: ONSLAUGHT
desc: • Deals 2 hits of physical damage to a single target.
• Gain Perfect Hit status for 2 turns and 100% Critical Strike Chance for 1 turn on Perfect Hits.

skills.name: SPUR
desc: • Deals 3 hits of physical damage to all enemies.
• 50% Chance for each ally to gain Counterstrike for 1 turn.

skills.name: CERTAIN DEATH
desc: • Deals 2 hits of physical damage to a single target.
• Attacks have a 25% Chance to Critically Strike.
• Grant Heal Shield for self and up to 3 allies on Perfect Hits.

skills.name: WAR CALL
desc: • Increase MR of allies for 2 turns.
• Heal all allies based on their ATK stat.

skills.name: ARMED FORCE
desc: Grant Perfect Immunity and Echo to all allies for the duration of battle. Reduce the damage all allies take by 35%. Cleanse and Heal allies if Perfect Hit is active when you take an action.
